messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Report

Thanks to the tireless efforts of our security and intelligence divisions, there are currently no credible threats to Evil Tomb 13. All station construction projects have been authorized. Have a secure shift!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

High levels of radiation detected near the station. Maintenance is best shielded from radiation.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

The radiation threat has passed. Please return to your workplaces.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Fitness Room.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Evil Tomb 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: BAD THINGS

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nuclear Self Destruct Codes Requested

The codes for the on-station nuclear self-destruct have been requested by Bob Dobbs. Confirmation or denial of this request will be sent shortly.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Attention. Reordering the nuclear codes will result in instant termination. Your station is stable.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to space-winter, not more than 15 wire eating mammals have descended into the maintenance areas.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Classified Message

A report has been downloaded and printed out at all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: totally a board there on is

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Warning. Continued use of the communications console without consent will result in termination.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Ionospheric anomalies detected. Temporary telecommunication failu*3mga;b4;'1vï¿½-BZZZT

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on our omnipotence, we believe that one of the station's lesser lifeforms has developed clown level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on [REDACTED], we believe that one of the station's lesser lifeforms has developed security level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Russian Outreach Program

Cargo: A group of angry Russians want to have a party. Can you send them your cargo shuttle then make them disappear?

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Attention Space Station 13. Your station is now under review by one of our officals. CentComm out.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Insane casuality rate, too many negative points within 15 minutes of the station review. im firing all of you

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Escape Shuttle Hallway.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body:
We found this strange shuttle called "667" for 3 dollars on SpaceBay

Just dont pop the balloon it said

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: our assistant is telling us, someone already popped the balloon, get some guns for us and we'll up your paygrade to 10 cents

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: AI Satellite Atmos.
